name: ARXIV__GET_CATEGORIES
description: Retrieves a structured list of all available subject categories on arXiv.

name: ARXIV__SEARCH_PAPERS
description: Searches for academic papers on arXiv by query and other criteria.

query.description: The search query (e.g., 'quantum computing' or 'au:Del_Maestro AND ti:checkerboard').

max_results.description: The maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 10.

sort_by.description: The criterion for sorting results. Defaults to 'relevance'.

name: ARXIV__GET_PAPER_METADATA
description: Retrieves detailed metadata for a specific paper on arXiv by its unique ID.

paper_id.description: The arXiv ID of the paper (e.g., '1605.08386v1' or 'math.GT/0309136').

name: ARXIV__GET_DAILY_UPDATES
description: Fetches papers submitted to a specific category on a given date.

category.description: The category to check for updates (e.g., 'cs.AI', 'econ.EM').

date.description: The date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format to fetch updates for. Defaults to today.

max_results.description: The maximum number of papers to return. Defaults to 20.
